timeline.body: ![INFO](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/severity-info.png 'Severity: INFO') Do not forget to remove this deprecated code someday. [![rule](https://sonarsource.github.io/sonar-github/rule.png)](https://sonar.projects.vaadin.com/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AS1133)
timeline.bodyText: Do not forget to remove this deprecated code someday.
timeline.bodyHTML: Do not forget to remove this deprecated code someday.
timeline.author: vaadin-bot
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -84,12 +84,18 @@ public MultiSelectionEvent(C listing, *

* The result is the current selection of the source listing. So it's always * exactly the same as {@link #getValue()}. + *

+ * The method will be removed in a later major version. * * @see #getValue() + * @see #getAllSelectedItems() * * @return an unmodifiable set of items selected after the selection was * changed + * @deprecated Use {@link #getValue()} or {@link #getAllSelectedItems()} + * instead which are the exact replacements for this method. */ + @Deprecated public Set getNewSelection() {
